website_summaries.verdict: Fair durability and sound quality for a highly appealing price. Owners are satisfied.
cons: Some say it is too loud and the sound can be tinny

customer_reviews.title: High quality; A great bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 14 year old son. I've been a drummer for 35 years and I can say this drumset is a great bargain. The quality is fantastic. It is a full-size kit, perfect for all but the youngest children. I highly recommend getting this set, rather than a "child's" set, if it's affordable. Yes, the cymbals aren't great, but they get the job done. I don't have any problem with the heads; they're fine. All in all, just a great kit.. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10 year old son!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 10 year old son for his birthday and 5 months later he has not lessened in his excitement. He plays this set every single day. While it doesn't have quite the sound of an "adult" drum set, it does not sound like a toy set either. Set up wasn't too bad with the help of the dvd and now he likes to move around and tweak his set to his own liking. I wholeheartedly recommend as I searched long and hard for just the right set. He will eventually upgrade the cymbals as he has already started looking on amazon for new ones, but for now those are ok too.
customer_reviews.author: A6

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Purchased this set for my daughter who ...
customer_reviews.text: Starter set. Good price. Purchased this set for my daughter who has been taking percussion classes in school for two years. After 6 months we upgraded the cymbals. They had warped from frequent playing, and they never really offered the sound quality she was looking for. I expect we will be replacing the snare drum in the near future as well, because we just can’t get the right sound from it. Overall, it really is a good set for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set.
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a beginner set, but it's not a toy. This is a REAL drum kit. The heads and cymbals are less than you would want to tour with, but very adequate for home/.kid use. The overall quality is very good. Set up... not at all fast. If it's a gift give yourself plenty of time. You will need a drummer friend or have been in a band that has a player with a full kit. I would imagine there are a few Youtube sites that could help. Otherwise it could take you some time to figure this one out. THERE ARE NO INSTRUCTIONS!
customer_reviews.author: Dexter Thomas

customer_reviews.title: NICE DRUM SET....MAKES ME WANT TO GO UPSTAIRS AND PLAY
customer_reviews.text: I am 65 years old and have played in bands on and off for 50 years. I have always played guitar and several other instruments. I've been around a lot of drums and drummers, so what the heck,why not drums. My current drummer came over and we put the set together and I've got nothing but great things to say about this set,,,,,Price = great. What you get/value =excellent...Ease of assembly= excellent. Sound = excellent. .Cymbals are adequate, and certainly part of the overall value package...MAKES ME WANT TO GO UPSTAIRS AND PLAY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Box delivered on time, and was exactly as it was pictured. My son is just starting out on drums, and this is the perfect set for him. The cymbals are not that great, but hey, for the price, they are perfect. The only item that was not included was the "tuning key", which is something you REALLY need to put this set together. Lucky for me, Ken Stanton Music is close by, and gave my son one for FREE. Now, my son can play all day long...in the basement...HA.
customer_reviews.author: FrankieD

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner drum set at a great price. Bought this for my son's 11th birthday. He is 13 now and still playing it. I recommend the pads to muffle the sound, unless you want your neighbors to hate you. And maybe some earplugs or noise cancelling headphones for your own sanity, because your little drummer will be making a bunch of racket for hours on end with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Kris KC

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality material than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son who became interested in drumming recently. Seems to be holding up good so far. It’s honestly better than I expected as far as quality. I can’t really comment about sound because i have nothing to compare to and i may not even have it tuned right anyways. Set up took me about an hour and a half. The only negative is that it arrived with a chip in the bass drum wood from shipping I’m sure. Didn’t appear to be in a spot that would effect anything so I let it go. Overall, I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Sons first drum set!
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is great for the price. I recommend this set for any beginner. My 11 year old loves it. It would of received a 5 star but 2 of the drums were damaged out of the box. the edge was crushed. Luckily both were hidden by the rings that secure the face to the drums and that the damage was on the non striking side of the drum so i don't think it affects the sound.
customer_reviews.author: MTibo

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: This drum set was a Christmas present for my 9 year old and he loves it. It’s a good quality drum set, the only problem is the bass drum head rims were dented and bent and we could not assemble the bass drum because of this. I have reached out to Gammon about this problem and have not heard anything back as of yet. I’m hoping they will reply to my email. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: pixiedust

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, good qualify, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The product is better than I thought. Good qualify, very easy to follow assembly instructions (may not need instructions just by looking at the picture of it you still can easily to assemble). I recommend this drum set for beginner and intermediate drum players.
customer_reviews.author: Mante

customer_reviews.title: Difficult Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the ad, this set is NOT easy to assemble. It does come with paper directions as well as a DVD. Yet, it isn’t detailed directions. For example, if you aren’t well versed in tuning like myself, you’ll have to research how to set this set up. Once it’s together and tuned, it’s an excellent product for beginners and intermediates! It is also very sturdy. Great drum set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased, bought it for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: very pleased, bought it for my 9 year old. It is not a kid size one as my husband is also able to play on it. It took us about an hour to put it together, very easy to follow instruction video and paper that came with it. All is well made and shipped in one heavy square box.
customer_reviews.author: mayola

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drum set for a beginner. My son is 7 and taking drum lessons and this set fits him really well. My only complaint is that one of the high hats was missing a part, so it sits lopsided on its stand. It doesn't hinder him from playing, it's just a slight nuisance that I have to figure out where to get the piece from. It wasn't worth taking apart and shipping back. The drum set has been played on by many kids who aren't the most gentile (and some adults!) and it has held up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Combs

customer_reviews.title: best price for beginner set, no question
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why people are giving this set anything but 5 stars - for the price, there's nothing else on the market that comes close to competing. I bought these drums for $187, which included shipping, and I'm thrilled with them. They come with everything you see in the picture, in case you're wondering. If you're just starting out on drums, like me, buy this set, see how you do, then upgrade if need be. Do they sound as good as a $3,000 Tama set? Of course not. But for <$200, they're a steal. Definitely an easy purchase for anyone who's interested in learning how to play the drums.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Caufield

customer_reviews.title: Great frum set
customer_reviews.text: My husband always wanted a drum set, so now that he is 90, he got it at last. He is enjoying very much. He just got a book to teach him all he needs to know. It arrived a day early which made him very happy..
customer_reviews.author: Frances Schwendeman

customer_reviews.title: Great set to start off with, and wonderful customer service
customer_reviews.text: My soon-to-be-9 year old son is starting drum lessons for his birthday. I ordered these drums, and so far no complaints! I needed some help setting them up, but I have absolutely no experience with drums, and as of now, they have held up to both of my young sons banging away on them. His teacher said it was a good set for him when he saw them, and the company's customer service is amazing! One of the screws hadn't been threaded properly, and the company immediately emailed me back when I emailed them about a replacement piece, helped clarify exactly what I needed, and sent us a new one that we received only a couple days later.
customer_reviews.author: plainmaryjane

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time in a large square box. Packing was perfect. Everything you need for a starting drum kit. It was for my daughter. It was easy for her to assemble, she's a DIY'er. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: fine for the beginner or practice
customer_reviews.text: For someone unsure if they are going to stick with drumming it is fine to learn on and build up to something better. The seat broke it isn't madeto ssupport a lot of weight. The cymbals and high hats have begun pitting. I haven't played around too much on them so they haven't taken much abuse. There isn't much instruction on tightening the drum lugs just be very careful not to go to tight, I was scared to rip any heads. Surprisingly the full size Tom took the force of a trumpet being struck against it and won, the trumpet is no longer playable while the Tom is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: The drum set is awesome for the price and my son loves it! It is exactly what we needed and comes with literally everything you need including drumsticks. It was extremely overwhelming putting it together because of how many pieces it comes in but the online video (or included DVD) makes it easy to follow along. For someone who had no idea to set up a drum set, I was able to do so without much trouble, although it did take awhile to complete it. Great product, very pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne OGara

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set for the price. My 10 yr old son absolutely loves this set. It’s high quality and I am very satisfied with this purchase. The price is amazing for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great starter (or re-starter) set.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our son. He has been wanting a 'real' drum set for a while. It is well packed and easy to set up. The included drum heads are OK to start with, but you will want to upgrade those and included cymbals soon after starting with this set. My son has played the heck out of this set for a year and a half and is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter the Southern Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners, I learn a lot with them to start off, I would definitely recommend for beginner to get started , it’s very loud but gets you started and very nice. Good quality for the price, I have a mapex set now but I still use these to teach my kids
customer_reviews.author: Yordan

customer_reviews.title: I am not a musician yet I can see that there are upgrades as others have said to make these sound much better. They are built we
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these drums for our son, there is a lot of equipment for the price. I am not a musician yet I can see that there are upgrades as others have said to make these sound much better. They are built well, sturdy and the pedals work very well. Cymbals are a little tinny. As for a set to see if you our your child is really interested in drumming you can not beat the price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Bass arrived with bent rims
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a blue set for our 12-year-old and a black set was delivered. Okay, he can live with that. When assembling, the rims on the base drum were misshapen and dented in one spot. We manged to tweak them to "round" again and got them assembled. Lug on bass drum pedal was so tight it could not be turned to allow insertion of bass drum kicker. We put a drop of oil on it and let it sit for an hour or so and it was finally able to be backed out. Video assembly is useless as there is no sound/narration. Overall disappointing, but managed to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Completely complete!
customer_reviews.text: We had some issues at the beginning because the initial set that was sent to us was missing the snare and the L arms to connect the toms to the lug drum. FINALLY after everything got sorted out, we have a complete drum set. Everything looks exactly as pictured. My daughters love it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: Vlaster

customer_reviews.title: Good starter drum set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good set of drums for the price. Great starter set. Don't expect top of the line sound, but they sound good enough. Sturdy quality parts and assembly is easy.
customer_reviews.author: shager36

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old grandson for Christmas. He loves it! He had outgrown his Gammon junior size drum set and was ready for a full size. Since we were very impressed with the junior size, this one was the logical choice. It has a much better (and louder) sound.
customer_reviews.author: Faye Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. My son loves it! I was able to assemble even though the online video was awful. The written instructions were ok. Would recommend a drum tuner.
customer_reviews.author: Brandonjay

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I used a video on YouTube of how to assemble this kit and it didn’t take to long and was pretty simple. Great set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little set for the money
customer_reviews.text: A good little drum set for the money. Had difficulty assembling the high hat, the instructional DVD was of no help. The rest was rather easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: BRGR

customer_reviews.title: beautiful in black
customer_reviews.text: this set is very good, from the complete beginner view of course. looks beautiful, sounds nice (i put foam to silence it and such the tone). it has everything which is needed to start, they even sent a pair of drumsticks.
customer_reviews.author: Piotr S

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud and Obnoxious-Perfect for my nephews to annoy my brother
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law bought this for my nephews and my brother rather enjoys really loud noises all day long (sarcasm) so I encourage my nephews to play these every time I stop by really loud to make his life more bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Buckalicious

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and myself to play around and learn some drums. Quality was for a beginner set is great. Only giving 4 stars as the directions didn't really seem to go as in depth as i would have liked being someone who has never setup a drum-set before. I do recommend going and getting a good pair of sticks, I broke the head off of one the day that I got the set.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Michie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sounding and looking set!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Has stood up to some pretty long and loud jam sessions!! Still looks and sounds great! ****important*** the instructional video says to watch it ALL the way through before starting project. We didn’t. We watched it as we went along and ended up doing it all over again!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I love this set!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the cymbals which are very tinny, this set sounds fantastic! Don't forget to throw a pillow in the kick drum before you cap it. 5 stars because the set sounds and looks much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to drums and this has been a great set so far! My husband and I were able to assemble it fairly easy. So far I’m really happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes this a full size drum set for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This will be a good drum set for a beginner ! I personally would get a more expensive drum set that sound like a more professional sound! That has much better skins and the rim around all have that has skins on them are plastic ! I will keep it and give it to my grandson for Xmas . For me I will get the drum that sounds like a drum. But overall it's for a beginner not someone that has played drums 10 year or more .
customer_reviews.author: Alvin E.

customer_reviews.title: Good set for beginner drummers.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a beginner drummer. The instructions for assembly were clear and easy to follow. It came with everything needed. The sound is good enough for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: P&C Chow

customer_reviews.title: You cannot go wrong with this drum set!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in time for the holidays! Opened it up and had no problems. We assembled it and had no issues. Came with everything to start drumming and my kiddo loved it. Brought a buddy of mine who is a drummer and was amazed how it sounded and was in shock for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I would totally recommend this drum set to anyone who wants to give drumming a try. The set itself is made of very good material. I bought it for my 9 year old son and he's been banging away without issues. You will need about 4'x4' of space for the drums. In his excitement, my 9 year old tore up a box and inadvertently scratched one of the skins of the drums. It looked like it was going to tear. I immediately contacted the seller and we had a replacement part within days without questions. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: crblm5

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: For the price this set comes with a lot of great features. It took a bit to set up but nothing to complain about. Great sound too!
customer_reviews.author: Nirvanaaz

customer_reviews.title: Great value, you will be happy with this set.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great set for adults adding to their music room. Very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: William D Merryman

customer_reviews.title: Its a very good drum kit for a full adult size i refer ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good drum kit for a full adult size i refer this product to anyone for any beginner and advance player, will be nice to have a 18 " cymbal comes along with the kit. I advise to cure the over ring on the kick bass, just add in a pillow that will enhance a punch more define sound other than that i gave it a 4 star good drum kit.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Talaro

customer_reviews.title: For the price its a great starter set or could be a cheaper way to ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price its a great starter set or could be a cheaper way to build onto an existing set you have. Of course the heads and cybals that come with it are definitely garbage, the cybals aren't worth their own weight in metal...HORRIBLE!!! I could've made a better sound with a fart and the heads aren't bad but still sound cheap. My suggestion is to order all new heads for all 5 shells with the set so u don't have to waste the time swapping heads
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful beginner set for our middle schooler who is playing percussion in band at such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: legit drumset
customer_reviews.text: If you are reading this, here is what you need to know about this drumset. I own this set. if your budget is low this is a GREAT BUY! ONE thing to keep in mind is that you will have to replace the following: =heads =cymbals =seat =snare =stands This is my current setup: -Meinl hcs 18 crash ride -Meinl 14 hihats -Zildjian 16 crash -Mapex snare -Evens G2 heads -Evens EMAD for the kick -PDP stands,snare stand and high tom stand and seat -everything else i kept stock I dont have much money so this is what ive been playing with for a year now. AND im happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stan Vasilchuk

customer_reviews.title: Sounds GREAT! Price is good
customer_reviews.text: Sounds GREAT! Price is good. It is been less a week the Drum set have been delivered. Hope it will be good for me as I wanna practice the drums for the worship service. Thank you Gammon Percussion and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Freeda

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but unless you are learning ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, but unless you are learning to play without arms, you will outgrow this kit in weeks...not months.
customer_reviews.author: Vozzo13

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Easy to assemble. Sounds good after using the drum tuner. Great value for the money. My kids love it! Will probably get better cymbals later on. For now it serves its purpose for my kids just beginning how to play drums. Updated 3/5/2016 Drums sound awesome now that I got the Zildjian cymbals to go with it! Cymbals that came with this set is totally crappy but for the amount I paid for this set that is to be expected. Great sounding cymbals are expensive! My son loves playing on this drums. Easy to assemble and disassemble for easy transport. My son used this very recently at his school's talent show and everyone loved his performance! 👍🏻😊
customer_reviews.author: lexydizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, but expect disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: After having 3 deliveries, it finally arrived undamaged. Manufacturers need to redesign the package. Drums are easily damaged in shipping. Otherwise a Beautiful drumset for beginners or novices .
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: We enjoyed the time together and since she had had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived the day after Christmas ( oh well) but my daughter (13) was pumped anyway. It took us about 3 hours to put it all together, which went very smoothly all in all. We enjoyed the time together and since she had had a few lessons, immediately began playing in the cold garage. Drums sounded ok to me, but I am not a musician. For the money, to have all the pieces together for a started set was incredible. Everything felt solid and heavy duty. The drum skins seemed plasticky, but sounded fine. I would recommend this as a full size starter set. Definitely watch the 10 min video first to get familiar with the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jawor

customer_reviews.title: I know nothing about drums but love them. I know nothing about quality of one ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 72 years young, I know nothing about drums but love them. I know nothing about quality of one drum set to another. All i know is they are Riot to play. The grandkids love them also.
customer_reviews.author: james miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set!!!
customer_reviews.text: This drum set is very nice for the price, the only gripe I had was putting it together but it's made well. I bought it for my son since he is in the band at his middle school and he absolutely loves it. I am sure others that play in a band would disagree that it's not worth the price but if you are just wanting to get into drumming and don't want to drop a lot of money this set is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Better packaging needed
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old. Simple to put together. Only negative was that 3 of the items were cracked on the side from delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Our box arrived damage with pieces missing. After informing the company, they were quick to fix our issues. They were prompt and professional. I'm not sure who enjoys the drum set more, my son or husband. My husband was very impressed with the quality of the set.
customer_reviews.author: LIRB

customer_reviews.title: they are adult size and perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my 10 year old son, he loves them! they are adult size and perfect for a beginner, but also perfect for anyone who doesn't need top of the line. Sticks are cheap, only complaint. You will need to buy new ones. Took 1.5 hours for an experienced drummer to set up., fyi.
customer_reviews.author: mickey wendt

customer_reviews.title: Great drum set for beginner
customer_reviews.text: These drums were a great value, they sound good. The cymbals were a little cheap sounding but everything else was good.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jools

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. The drums are excellent. They were easy to assemble and the build quality is very good. I am very happy with this purchase, and my son loves them!
customer_reviews.author: GAR35

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set. My 7yo is loving it and so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Grattan

customer_reviews.title: Our son says he loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our son who is almost eleven says he loves it. He plays it every chance he gets. A really good deal for a 5-piece set. Seems to have a good sound based on our non-professional ears. However, beware because the seat is hard. But none the less it does not seem to stop our son from enjoying playing. A note... when putting it together the hi hat gave us some trouble. There was plastic inside that prevented the pole from going all the way down. We managed to cut out the extra plastic and were good to go. No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: William Woodson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! But had to get a drummer to put them together and tune them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: A very pleased Drummer Mama!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son LOVES his full-size drum set and looks forward & is soo stoked to practice on it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha K. Morris

customer_reviews.title: great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have printed instructions but overall not too difficult to put together. Great set for a beginner!
customer_reviews.author: Omaha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drum set
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to assemble but was easy and great quality. Purchased for ten year old son. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, inexpensive set for a first-time drummer. We ordered it on a Sunday and had it by Wednesday. It came in two medium size boxes. If you're making the purchase as a gift, beware both boxes are marked "drum set." It couldn't have been more easy to assemble. I watched the assembly video once (about 11 minutes) and my husband and I had it put together in an hour. The sound quality is good for a beginner. We are planning to upgrade heads and cymbals, though, after enough time has passed that we know our child is committed to practicing. We could not be happier. -- Mrs. Shipp
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to set up. Cymbals are disappointingly cheap sounding
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to set up. Cymbals are disappointingly cheap sounding but ok for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Transient Noise

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! My son loves these drums and for a beginner set up I am really impressed. It’s been a little over two months now and they still sound just as good if not better. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a cheap drum set that can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are a great kit. They come with everything you need. However, I would not count on the cymbals. They are not quite the quality I am looking for and will definitely upgrade in the near future. The drum heads also have a little reverb, but thats not a huge problem to fix, if I decide to replace the drum heads as well. Note: Does require some intense set up. They came in itty bitty pieces and it took me a few hours to get them up and running. Overall, I'm happy with them, and would make this purchase again if given the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: For the price its extremely good
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very good sound from all five drums after tuning. Great price. Cons: hardware is thin, basic and may not offer comparability that would allow you to quickly grab a replacement at a local music store. Given: You will need to tune all five drums, dampen the toms and middle the bass.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old loves them. Only wish has some direction on tuning them. Easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: These are good for starter drums. I bought them for my grand daughter who has just started taking lessons. If you are expecting these to sound like Tama's or Pearl's, then you need to move on. They are just that.....a beginner set. The heads are not good, and the cymbals are ever worse, but for the price, these can't be beat. If you think you will be able to go out and gig with these drums, then again, move on. I will upgrade as she gets busetter, but for now, these do the job, and she plays them a lot! The directions are also not very clear. We looked up how to assemble the high hat on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Symphonysgrandma

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !
customer_reviews.text: This drum set is AWESOME ! It is everything we hoped for and more. Remember to watch the video CD first , then put it together . It will be a lot easier. My daughter is 10 years old and saved for these drums . She plays them everyday. It is worth the money. I know it cost a lot to mail , but considering how much the drums are else where , it is worth it. It comes in two boxes and you do have to put it together. But it looks GREAT and sounds GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: susan hoch

customer_reviews.title: This set is perfect for beginners or for a practice set that you ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for beginners or for a practice set that you really just want to beat on. I feel like you really get what you pay for with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dillan Henson

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is a reasonably priced set for your beginner. There is no reason to spend more. I do like how easily it was to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old has recently started drumming and this set works great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Quality control
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed well made and a good value until we started to put it together Quality control on the manufacturer's end is lacking with threading tools broke off in bolt holes preventing assembly
customer_reviews.author: Adam Clark

customer_reviews.title: drums good, customer service BAD
customer_reviews.text: drums were as stated, easy to assemble. good set for beginner. good value. Major draw back - Customer Service. basically doesn't exist. tried to communicate concerning a broken item and in 2019 it shouldn't be this difficult unless you really don't want to help. I'm trying to BUY an item to replace a damaged part and cant get any help. just Weird.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Drumset
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Two years ago I purchased the Gammon Drumset to get a cheap starter set, but I could play this drumset all the way through middle school and high school. I was just getting into drumming when I got this, but now I am an honor band percussionist still playing this sturdy set. Here are some pros and cons. Pros Good shipping and handling No drums have broken, very strong Very reasonable price Cons You have to ensemble Snare stand wasn't that great This is a great drum set, but don't expect $1,000 quality. I recommend this for youth and teen percussionists. I hope this helped you
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Church Drum Set
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Drum Set for our church. It has done what is expected. Being a Latin church you know it gets abused with all the Latin Rhythms.
customer_reviews.author: J.M. From Florida

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good drums, just some good tuning. cymbals need changing, and you be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a beginner!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my teenager. She has decided to be an "aspiring" drummer. They are perfect for her needs. They were easily assembled, sound good and are holding up well. She is pleased and I feel like the set was priced fairly. The only thing I'm not crazy about are the cymbals......they don't have a smooth sound..........kind of tinny & unpleasant, but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy setup. sound is good. for beginning playing works very well..get it.
customer_reviews.author: Duaine

customer_reviews.title: Kids have not stopped playing
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old, 6 year old play the drums into the night. The set is an adult set, but as the kids grow up I chose the full size version instead. I got a video how to set it up. The included instructions are black and white and no good. Drums are awesome - high quality. When played at night they are a little loud, but who likes neighbors anyways?
customer_reviews.author: Mike Burk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8 yr old and 11 yr old boys...wonderful non-electronic gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the best gift we've ever given our boys. I initially purchased another set from Target but it was too small for our 8 year old. This full sized/adult set is perfect for our 8yr old and 11 yr old and will last for years. It took us about 2 hours to set up but it is a great quality and looked so magnificent under the Christmas Tree. I would highly recommend. I almost kept the other set to save about $100 but I am so glad we spent a little extra for a set that will last them much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Beginner and for the Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great drum set for beginners and for the price!! Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.author: TomSawyerB

customer_reviews.title: Beginner
customer_reviews.text: This is our first set of drums. I bought them for my 14 year old son. Very cool set. Quality components. Even came with an instructional DVD on how to assemble. Also some free online lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Husband didn't have trouble setting it up
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Husband didn't have trouble setting it up. Son loves it but complains about the sound of one of the cymbals he will probably replace...if he keeps up playing.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dearest

customer_reviews.title: Great for our beginner!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter set! It will have to be replaced as our drummer advances her skills but that is to be expected. If you want the PERFECT set go drop a couple grand on a Yamaha. But if you're looking for something to get started on, this is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have so much fun with this set
customer_reviews.text: I have so much fun with this set. It is great for working out drum tracks at home before you go to your gig/studio/etc. Be sure to tune the heads right for best sound! The hat and crash lack shimmer, but the rest of the drums are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad that I ended up purchasing this set. I got it for my husband as a Christmas present. I put it together by myself, and had no problem even with my 2 year old, 3 month old, and dog. It sounds great too! I think the only thing I had trouble with, was figuring out which piece was which. I followed the online installation video, which was very helpful..but the pieces in the boxes arn't labeled, so it would take me a few extra minutes to make sure I was using the right piece. Other than that, definitely worth the money:)
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyy

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for my son
customer_reviews.text: My son is learning to play the drums at school and wanted a drum set of his own. Tried to make due with an electronic drum pad but heard that "it wasn't the same." So after some research and reading other reviews of this set, we decided to purchase it for his Christmas gift. The packages arrived in a timely manner, the website provided detailed instructions on putting things together, and they sound good. I think this is a great price and a good starting drum set for anyone learning to play! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: bensmom

customer_reviews.title: basic
customer_reviews.text: not that great. Should have included a tuner. Even after tuning, the sound is not very good.It is a very basic drum
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Manda

customer_reviews.title: Wow.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and now put together nice drum set for my money thanks much on fast shipping mr Knabenbauer
customer_reviews.author: Steve bauer

customer_reviews.title: Overall not a bad set for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad set for a beginner. My only complaint is the set was missing 3 washers for the tension rods and one of the tension rods for the toms was missing some threads.... Luckily there was an extra tension rod in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our grandson, who plays drums, he loved it because it was all inclusive & he said it was easy to tune & has great sound. His grandpa put it together & if someone who doesn't play a musical instrument can put it together that tells you how good the instructions are. It was a big birthday hit..
customer_reviews.author: harley 09

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our 9 and 12 year old sons! They love it! Veryloud but great quality! My only ‘con’ is that it comes totally disassembled so you have to put every screw in every part. So set up takes a long time. But after that, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Casey T

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: i just got this from ups. it got to my house in 5 days. all i got to say is its an amazing drum set i absolutely love it. it only took about 2 hours to assemble and every piece was in the box. now when it comes to sound i got to say its great every drum sounds good. i got it in 2 medium size boxes so i was like omg its going to be small but once i built it haha not small no more it was big!. so if you want a awesome drum set without paying up the ass i think you should order it :)
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Great Drums!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great set for our 9 yr old. Only thing that would have made it better was having instructions on how to put them together. Thank goodness for YouTube!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Can not be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to drums, but I have been a musician for years. These are good quality for the price. All my drummer friends think I spent a lot more than I did. I would recommend different cymbals, though.
customer_reviews.author: James

product_meta.title: Gammon Percussion Full Size Complete Adult 5 Piece Drum Set with Cymbals Stands Stool and Sticks, Black
product_meta.description: Size:Drum set| Color:BlackThere are lots of reasons this drum set has been the BEST SELLER for years! The Gammon Battle Series is the perfect entry level drum set at the lowest price ever for a complete, adult/full size drum set complete with all cymbals, stands, hardware, stool heads and sticks! This Brand New FULL-SIZE Drum Set has everything you need to start playing right away. Look at these AMAZING features: 22"x14" 12 Lug Bass Drum, 5 1/2" x 14 Wood Snare drum, 12"x10" and 13"x10 Mounted Toms w/ Adjustable Tilt Memory Locks, 16"x16" Floor tom, 2-12" Hi-Hat Cymbals, 1-14" Crash/Ride Cymbal, Snare/Hi-Hat/Crash Stands, Chain Driven Bass Drum and Hi-Hat Pedals and Drummer's Throne Included. Includes a pair of drum sticks and a drummer's key. High gloss black finish. Why Pay More? This set has it all! We also include a free drum instruction DVD to help you get started! Gammon is the music industry leader in quality, award-winning affordable drums and percussion.
feature_bullets: Included Drums: 22"x14" Bass, 5 1/2" x 14" Snare, 16"x16" Floor Tom, 12"x10" and 13"x10 Mounted Toms with Adjustable Tilt Memory Locks
Included Stands: Double Braced Snare Stand, Crash/Ride Stand, Chain Driven Hi-Hat stand
Included Accessories: Drummer's Throne/Stool, Pair of Drum Sticks and Drummer's Key

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars972 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
